page.title: 14VILLAGERS VIEWS
page.content: We interviewed a sample of population to include men and women and all ages. Women interviewed all liked living in the village and all liked their homes. 80% liked the villagers and the other 20% liked most of them.All of them liked the school and the clubs.70% said that we needed more shops 90% think there are enough facilites for adults 70% think that we have got enough facilites for children 60% think that there is enough green land in Hardwick.All of them like the Hardwick Happening.Most people moved because they needed to buy a bigger house.Most people would like a swimming pool in the village.They all find the transport from Hardwick to Cambridge was very good.
